producer = Isabella Butler
'''Associate producer:'''
Phillip Dye, Alexander Rupert

column1: }}'''''Tolkien's Road''''' is a fan film directed and written by Nye Green, produced as student short film project. It was released online on [[9 November]], [[2014]].

This is a student film project about J.R.R. Tolkien's journey to beginning his first book "The Hobbit." But before he can bring the world of Middle-Earth to life he must overcome the trauma of fighting in WWI and find his voice again. Tolkien's imagination comes to life everywhere he looks in the form of Elves, Dwarves and Dragons. But it is when he meets the Hobbit that he is transported on a journey of self discovery which will change himself and the world of literature forever.
* [https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCglJi_10x8_-Cy3vY9tOug  Tolkien's Road] at Youtube, for the trailers and featurettes.
* [http://tolkienbrasil.com/noticias/sobre-filmes/assista-o-filme-tolkiens-road/ Full Movie to watch] at Tolkienbrasil.com
* [http://elanillounico.com/noticias/peliculas/entrevistamos-en-exclusiva-a-nye-green-director-de-tolkiens-road/ Interview with director Nye Green] at elanillounico.com
